#summary Update procedure for VLCShares
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This tutorial describes how to update from an old version of VLCShares to a newer one


= Manual Procedure =

== Notes ==

This tutorial shows how to update from vlc-shares 0.5 (or 0.5.1beta4) to vlc-shares 0.5.1


==0.5 -> 0.5.1beta1==

  # Download 'UPDATE_vlc-shares_0.5.1.zip' from the download section.
  # Unpack the contents inside the directory _vlc-shares/public/_ of your vlc-shares installation directory
  # Open your browser at http://localhost/vlc-shares/public/update.php



  # Click on the red button (_blablablabla update vlc-shares_)
  # Go back to the vlc-shares dashboard (http://localhost/vlc-shares/public/)
